string.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a strong thread made of several threads twisted together, used for tying or fastening things
string.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Her key hung on a string around her neck.
I need a piece of string to tie this package.
string.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a number of similar things or events coming one after another
string.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: She owns a string of health clubs.
string.translation[0].definitions[3].def: a group of letters, words, or numbers, especially in a computer program
string.translation[0].definitions[4].def: one of the long thin pieces of wire, nylon etc that are stretched across a musical instrument and produce sound
string.translation[0].definitions[5].def: the people in an orchestra or band who play musical instruments that have strings, such as violins
string.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to put things together onto a thread, chain etc
string.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: beads strung on a silver chain
string.translation[1].definitions[1].def: to hang things in a line, usually high in the air, especially for decoration
string.translation[1].definitions[1].exa: Christmas lights were strung from one end of Main Street to the other.
string.translation[1].definitions[2].def: to put a string or a set of strings onto a musical instrument
